text.string: The Dried Lake (farm here until you feel strong enough to progress, kill Voll & get Deshret's Banner)
find entrance to The Crystal Veins (not needed in Merciless, place teleport here, it will help you progress quicker)
(you can skip the next part in Merciless)
The Crystal Veins (use teleport from earlier, get wp)
The Crystal Veins (complete "The King of Fury" & "The King of Desire")
The Belly of The Beast lvl 2 (kill Piety)
The Harvest (get wp, kill Malichai's 3 Guardians)
Open gate to The Black Core (important to do this before going afk or something! or you will have to kill all the Guardians again)
POE Quests tracker and leveling - Fast Leveling v2.2
The Riverways (follow the road, get wp, keep following the road, get to Western Forest)
Western Forest (get wp, kill/help Alira, you can find her by finding a break in the road, go south & kill the Blackguards & open the blocked pass)
Weaver’s Chambers (to find it, look for trees with spiderweb)
POE Quests tracker and leveling - Fast Leveling v2.2
The Broken Bridge (get wp, kill/help Kraityn) (follow the road, it will lead you to Kraityn)
The Fellshrine Ruins (right, good farming spot)
The Chambers of Sins lvl 2 (get wp, complete Library & "Intruders in Black")
The Riverways (follow the main road until you see a break, that path will lead you to the next area)
The Wetlands (kill/help Oak & get the apex, get wp, poison the tree & complete "The Root of the Prolem")
Defeat Blackguards and aquire "Lost in Love"
The Crematorium (get wp, complete Library, get Tolman's Bracelet)
The Slum Sewers (find the first Platinum Bust)
The Warehouse Sewers (very important! you must find the wp here! if you don’t it will set you back if you continue without it, find 2nd Platinum Bust)
The Marketplace (get wp, find Ornate Chests and Market Sewers (all near wp))
The Market Sewers (get last Platinum Bust)
POE Quests tracker and leveling - Fast Leveling v2.2
The Battlefront (get wp, find Ribbon Spool)
The Docks (get wp, talk to fairgraves & find Thaumetic Sulphate, farm here until you feel strong enough to progress)
The Solaris Temple (Give Lady Dialla Sulphate and Ribbon Spool for Infernal Talc)
The Warehouse Sewers (use Infernal Talc on Undying Passage)
Ebony Barracks (get wp, kill General Gravius)
Lunaris Temple lvl 2 (find & kill Piety, take Tower Key)
The Library (get wp, get to The Archives, complete "A Fixture of Fate")
The Hedge Maze (complete library, get Chitu's Plum)
The Lower Sceptre of God (get wp)
The Upper Sceptre of God (kill Dominus)
The Mud Flats (complete "Breaking Some Eggs" and then "A Dirty Job" in The Fetid Pool)
The Flooded Depths (complete "The Dweller of the Deep")
The Lower Prison (get wp, complete library)
Town (receive support gem and prepare for Merviel)
